import React from 'react'; import useWindowDimensions from '../hooks/useWindowDimensions' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ReactComponent as EditIcon } from '../icons/edit.svg'; import { ReactComponent as DeleteIcon } from '../icons/delete.svg'; import './dashboard.sass'; const Dashboard = ({ books, confirmDelete }) => { const { width } = useWindowDimensions(); const { push } = useHistory(); return ( {books.map((item) => { return ( width >= 600 ? :
{item.title}
{item.author}
{item.category}
{item.isbn}
) })}
Title Author Category ISBN Actions
{item.title} {item.author} {item.category} {item.isbn}
) } export default Dashboard
